label: coreServiceDomain
description: the ingress domain of harbor core registry service

label: caCert
description: the ca cert of harbor registry service

label: tlsCert
description: the tls cert of harbor registry service

label: tlsKey
description: the tls key of harbor registry service

label: storageClass
description: registry component storageClass type and default is lvm

label: storageSize
description: registry component storage size and default is 50(Gi)

label: externalURL
description: the external url of harbor registry service

label: adminPassword
description: harbor admin password and default is zcloud
